edu.msu.cse.dkvf

Class Storage

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.msu.cse.dkvf.Storage
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BDBStorage

    public abstract class Storage
extends java.lang.Object
    The storage layer. Any driver written for a specific product must extend this class to let the framework work with it.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Storage.StorageStatus
      The status of a storage operation.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public abstract Storage.StorageStatus init(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> parameters,
                                           java.util.logging.Logger logger)
        Initializes the storage engine.
        Parameters:
        parameters - A map of properties required by the storage engine to initialized.
        logger - The logger used by the storage engine.
        Returns:
        The result of the operation.

      • insert

        public abstract Storage.StorageStatus insert(java.lang.String key,
                                             Record value)
        Inserts/updates a value for the given key.
        Parameters:
        key - The record key of the key to insert.
        value - The value to insert to the record.
        Returns:
        The result of the operation.

      • read

        public abstract Storage.StorageStatus read(java.lang.String key,
                                           java.util.function.Predicate<Record> p,
                                           java.util.List<Record> result)
        Reads the value of a key.
        Parameters:
        key - The record key of the key to read.
        p - The predicate that must be true for the value to be returned.
        result - The value of the record. . Only the first element of the list will be used as the result value. If the list is empty, key does not exists.
        Returns:
        The result of the operation.

      • run

        public abstract Storage.StorageStatus run()
        Runs the storage engine.
        Returns:
        The result of the operation.

      • close

        public abstract Storage.StorageStatus close()
        Closes the storage engine.
        Returns:
        The result of the operation.

      • clean

        public abstract Storage.StorageStatus clean()
        Cleans the whole data.
        Returns:
        The result of the operation.
